tpcsdk API

TSH Token Push and Control

TSH Token Push and Control (TPC) is one of our digital payment solutions to ease enrollment by pushing cards directly from the mobile banking app to OEM Pays and e-Merchants. This allows the cardholders full control of their digital cards stored in different wallets and e-Merchants from their bank mobile app and web site.

TPC comes with an SDK supporting these features to the issuers. With the SDK provided, the issuers are offered the OEM push provisioning (or in-app enrolment) capability to hide the complexity of several supporting algorithms and keys of issuers such as Mastercard, Visa, Apple, and so on. The SDK also provides push provisioning to scheme, a list of digital cards (tokens) that have already been provisioned into OEM wallets and merchants using Mastercard and Visa TSP (MDES and VTS) to the issuers for the convenience of the issuers.
